name: Core_InlineArrayList_clear
signatureRemarks: where <Suffix> and <Type> can assume the values of
success: All elements were removed from this @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>')} object.
Consequently, the size of the @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>')} object is zero.
If a @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>_ElementRemovedCallback')} function is associated with this @{code('Core_InlineArrayList<Suffix>')} object,
the function was invoked on each removed element exactly once.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
This function fails only with the specified errors/error conditions.
